metadata.Title: CVE-2019-19814 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - low.
metadata.Description: In the Linux kernel 5.0.21, mounting a crafted f2fs filesystem image can cause __remove_dirty_segment slab-out-of-bounds write access because an array is bounded by the number of dirty types (8) but the array index can exceed this.

notes.Note: tyhicks> As of 2020-01-09, no upstream fix is available
